mods.title: UnityExplorer Mono
mods.author: Sinai
mods.description: An in-game UI for exploring, debugging and modifying Unity games.

mods.title: Runtime Unity Editor
mods.author: ManlyMarco
mods.description: In-game inspector and debugging tools. May work on games where UnityExplorer fails.

mods.title: UnityExplorer Il2Cpp
mods.author: Sinai
mods.description: An in-game UI for exploring, debugging and modifying Unity games. Not compatible with Config Manager.

mods.title: DEPRECATED UUVR Mono
mods.author: Raicuparta
mods.description: F3: Toggle VR. F4: Reparent Camera. F5: Fix UI. Unity 5-2019 only

mods.title: DEPRECATED UUVR IL2CPP
mods.author: Raicuparta
mods.description: F3: Toggle VR. F4: Reparent Camera. F5: Fix UI. Unity 5-2019 only

mods.title: UUVR Il2Cpp Legacy
mods.author: Raicuparta
mods.description: Uses OpenVR. Start SteamVR before starting the game. Use the Configuration Manager mod to change UUVR settings for each game.

mods.title: UUVR Mono Legacy
mods.author: Raicuparta
mods.description: Uses OpenVR. Start SteamVR before starting the game. Use the Configuration Manager mod to change UUVR settings for each game.

mods.title: UUVR Mono Modern
mods.author: Raicuparta
mods.description: Supports OpenXR and OpenVR. Use the Configuration Manager mod to change UUVR settings for each game.

mods.title: Config Manager IL2CPP
mods.author: sinai
mods.description: Press F5 to show an in-game menu for changing mod settings. Use this with UUVR. Not compatible with UnityExplorer.

mods.title: Config Manager Mono
mods.author: sinai
mods.description: Press F5 to show an in-game menu for changing mod settings. Use this with UUVR.
